metadata.title: CVE-2020-21601 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libde265 v1.0.4 contains a stack buffer overflow in the put_qpel_fallbackfunction, which can be exploited via a crafted a file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.2-2ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1
libde265-examples - 1.0.2-2ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libde265 package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.2-2ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1').
